text: When this card enters your stable, choose any player. Pull a card from that player's hand.
Choose anu player. Return a card in that player's stable to their hand. That player must DISCARD a card.
Trade hands with any other player.
Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

If this card is in your stable at the beginning of your go, you may DESTROY a unicorn card. If you do, immediately skip to your End of Turn phase.
When this card enters your Stable, you may choose an Instant card from the discard pile and add it to your hand. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.
When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE all downgrade cards.
When this card enters your Stable, you may choose a Unicorn card from the discard pile and add it to your hand. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

This card can only enter a Stable if there is a Basic Unicorn in that Stable. If this Card is in your Stable at the beginning  of your turn, you may bring a Basic Unicorn directly from your hand into your stable.
DRAW 3 cards and DISCARD a card.
Return a card in each player's stable to that player's hand.
This card can only enter a Stable if there is a Basic Unicorn in that Stable. If this Card is in your Stable at the beginning  of your turn, you may DRAW an extra card.
SACRIFICE a card, then DESTROY 2 cards.
Cards you play cannot be Neigh'd
If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, SACRIFICE a unicord card, then DRAW a card.
All of your Unicorns are now considered Pandas. Cards that affect Uicorn cards do not affect your Pandas
If at any time you have more than 3 Unicorns in your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card.
You cannot play upgrade cards.
